component.name: ScreenCloud
component.summary: Easy to use screenshot sharing application

description.p:
Take a screenshot using one of the 3 hotkeys or simply click the ScreenCloud tray icon. You can choose where you want to save your screenshot. Several cloud services as well as local storage is supported.
Features: Open Source and cross-platform(Windows, Mac & Linux). Fast and easy: Snap a photo, paste the link, done! Plugin support, save to Dropbox, Imgur, etc Built in screenshot editor.
